mdRecord.dcterms:title: The black riders and other lines: [cover designs, trial covers, prospectus]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Crane, Stephen, 1871-1900
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Folder 1) 4 drawings for cover designs -- Folder 2) 10 proofs (on paper) for the cover, with design as published, in a variety of shades of grey and tan, also one in pale blue and some in olive green. Portrait of Crane -- Folder 3) Prospectus (as published). Prospectus with "Ordered 500 / 50 in Mar '95" written at top in green ink. Two proof copies of p. [1] of the prospectus. Six proof copies of p. [2] of the prospectus. One proof copy of text leaf, beginning "IX I stood upon a high place ... " One trial cover (?) with title printed in white on black paper.
See related correspondence in the Papers of Stephen Crane, MSS 5505.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Stephen Crane Collection. Gift of C. Waller Barrett.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crane, Stephen, 1871-1900--Black riders and other lines
